infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: RoadSolSafe needs your location in the background to collect safe driving data and award you rewards.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: RoadSolSafe needs your location to track your trips and calculate your safety score.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: RoadSolSafe needs your location always to collect trip data even when the app is in the background.
infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: RoadSolSafe needs motion sensor access to detect hard braking, acceleration, and cornering for your safety score.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow RoadSolSafe to use your location to track trips and calculate safety scores.
plugins.locationAlwaysPermission: Allow RoadSolSafe to use your location in the background to collect trip data.
plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow RoadSolSafe to use your location while using the app.
